title: (x) Afterglo restaurant logo - Sand {Evan}
content:
Can anyone ID the font on the top of this page where it says Afterglow?

[http://www.afterglo-restaurant.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811192737/http:/www.afterglo-restaurant.com/ "http://www.afterglo-restaurant.com/")

 [‹ "Music Essence" vintage looking wide display serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811192737/http:/typophile.com/node/19347 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Nimbus (Helvetica), URW Grotesk (Futura), Modern Sans (Akzidenz-Grotesk), Linear (Univers) {Geoff, Brad, John McH} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811192737/http:/typophile.com/node/19406 "Go to next forum topic")
author: DjArcadian

comments.content: Looks like the common Mac system font called Sand
